### Themes
* Themes
  * Importing a Theme doesn't mean it persists because we `doNotSave` it:
    *  <<packages.import name:themes url:./packages/themes.json filter:white>>
    *  <<packages.import name:themes url:./packages/themes.json filter:khaki>>

tiddlers.text:
## Search
* Open all results
* Highlight search term

## Code Tiddlers
* Only run when opened

## Links
* Auto link CamelCase
* Browser history (back)

## Tabs:
* Favories view of favorite tiddlers
* History view of recently viewed tiddlers
* Recent view of recently edited tiddlers

# Toolbars
* Close other tiddlers
* ‚≠ê Add to Favorites
